mapper.insert: insert into cinema (name, local, address, tel, totalTheater, trafficInfo, parkingInfo, intro) values (#{name}, #{local}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{totalTheater}, #{trafficInfo}, #{parkingInfo}, #{intro})
mapper.update: update cinema set address=#{address}, tel=#{tel}, totalTheater=#{totalTheater}, totalSeat=#{totalSeat}, trafficInfo=#{trafficInfo}, parkingInfo=#{parkingInfo}, intro=#{intro} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select local from cinema group by local
select local, name from cinema order by local;
